about_section.description: I'm a Game Designer specialized in creating compelling gameplay experiences and level design. With over 3 years of experience working on indie game projects, I’ve led teams, designed core mechanics, and developed levels across various genres—from puzzle shooters to narrative-driven platformers. I’m skilled in C#, Unity, and collaborative development, and I’m always looking for new challenges to push player interaction and design innovation further.

card_1.card_text: Degree on Interactive Software Development and Video Games

2D Side scroller, platformer and puzzle game. 
Designed core mechanic, enemy types, and full narrative. Led the project and team.

card_2.card_text:
2D Top down adventure game for the game jam plus. 
Supported level design for ability-based progression.

card_3.card_text:
2D Side scroller rhythm-based Metroidvania.
Assisted in mechanic and level design.

card_4.card_text:
First person puzzle shooter.
Designed main mechanic and all levels.

card_5.card_text:
3D Action adventure game.
Full level design from blocking to final layout; contributed to mechanics.

card_6.card_text:
2.5D game jam plus latam winner
Created themed levels and gameplay systems under time constraints.
